PCB Stack-up - Type-3, 0.9mm, 10L, Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML) - Tline Spec (Differential)
Reverted TCP DP MR MS L1/L10 spacing (S – ES) from 800um to 500um and (S - Non-ES) from 800um to 500um.
PCB Stack-up - Type-3, 0.9mm, 10L, Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML) - Tline Spec (Differential)

Reverted TCP USB 3.2 Type-A BO spacing (S - ES) from 300um to 200um for MS L1/L10, SL L3/L6/L8, and DSL L5/L6. Reverted TCP USB 3.2 Type-A MR spacing for MS L1/L10 (S - ES) from 750um to 300um and (S - Non-ES) from 500um to 300um, for SL L3/L6/L8 & DSL L5/L6 (S - ES) from 450um to 300um and (S - Non-ES) from 500um to 300um. Reverted HDMI (Post-Channel) MR MS L1/L10 TW from 95um to 75um and TS from 200um to 110um.
PCB Stack-up - Type-3, 0.9mm, 10L, Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML) - Tline Spec (Differential)

Updated CNVio3 BO MS L1/L10 & SL L3/L6/L8 spacing (S - ES and S - Non-ES) from 200um to 375um and 300um to 375um. Updated CNVio3 MR SL L3/L6/L8 spacing (S - Non-ES) from 640um to 375um. Updated CNVio3 signal spacing guideline in notes section.
PCB Stack-up - Type-3, 0.9mm, 10L, Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML) - Tline Spec (Differential)
Remove UFS 4.0 as it is not POR for NVL-AX/AM platform.
PCB Stack-up - Type-3, 0.9mm, 10L, Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML) - Tline Spec (Differential)

(1) Updated TCP USB 3.2 Type-A BO spacing (S - ES) from 200um to 300um for MS L1/L10, SL L3/L6/L8, and DSL L5/L6. (2) Updated TCP USB 3.2 Type-A MR spacing for MS L1/L10 (S - ES) from 300um to 750um and (S - Non-ES) from 300um to 500um, for SL L3/L6/L8 & DSL L5/L6 (S - ES) from 300um to 450um and (S - Non-ES) from 300um to 500um. (3) Updated TCP DP MR MS L1/L10 spacing (S – ES) from 500um to 800um and (S - Non-ES) from 500um to 800um. (4) Updated CNVio3 MR MS L1/L10 spacing (S – ES) from 375um to 800um and (S - Non-ES) from 600um to 800um. (5) Updated HDMI (Post-Channel) MR MS L1/L10 TW from 75um to 95um and TS from 110um to 200um. (6) Updated CPU PCIe Gen 5 MR SL L3/L6/L8 spacing (S - ES) from 230um and 375um. (7) Updated TCP TBT4 and TCP TBT5 MR DSL L5/L6 spacing (S - ES) from 375um to 450um and (S - Non-ES) from 375m to 500um.
PCB Stack-up - Type-3, 0.9mm, 10L, Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML) - Tline Spec (Differential)
Added USB 2.0, Differential Clock (PCH-CPU Support), DMI Gen5, PCH PCIe Gen5, PCH PCIe Gen1-4.
PCB Stack-up - Type-3, 0.9mm, 10L, Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML) - Tline Spec (Single Ended)
Remove UFS Reference Clock as UFS 4.0 is not POR for NVL-AX/AM platform.
PCB Stack-up - Type-3, 0.9mm, 10L, Mainstream, Premium Mid Loss (PML) - Tline Spec (Single Ended)
Added a note that CPU Sideband IO refers to CATERR#, EPD_ON, FORCEPR#, THERMTRIP#, VDD2PWRGOOD signals.
